text: int main ( ) { long int t ; scanf ( "%ld" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { long int n ; scanf ( "%ld" , & n ) ; long int i ; long int arr [ n ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%ld" , arr + i ) ; long int count [ n ] ; i = 1 ; count [ 0 ] = 1 ; while ( i != n ) { if ( arr [ i ] >= arr [ i - 1 ] ) count [ i ] = count [ i - 1 ] + 1 ; else count [ i ] = 1 ; i ++ ; } long ans = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { ans += count [ i ] ; } printf ( "%ld" , ans ) ; printf ( "\n" ) ; } return 0 ; }
